snippet.title: Homecoming - Official Trailer | Indie Horror Game
snippet.description:
This is a personal project that I developed in October 2022 using Unreal Engine 4. In order for the player to survive, a mysterious story must be solved by using various items and clues. It's a loop-based game where you need to find an exit to the nightmare you are traped in. 
I have been inspired by games like P.T, Resident Evil or The Backrooms 1998

You can check my work here: https://metalblackeddy.artstation.com/
A new update is coming! https://www.patreon.com/Homecoming253
Try it for yourself and tell me what you think: https://blondestudios.itch.io/homecoming-v2
